languages.text: "Хотя численно мы превосходим врага, дружина наша дурна. Состоит она из стальных кэрлов Омниссии да скверно обученных серфов со всего Коронуса. Противостоят же нам презренные, но от того не менее смертоносные гнилосердные юкко из боевой банды Несущих Слово. Их же ладьи прикрывают Машинный храм с орбиты".

"We may outnumber the enemy, but ours is a poor warband. All it has is steel kaerls of the Omnissiah and scantly trained serfs from across the Expanse. While our foe is the detestable but nevertheless deadly putrid-hearted traitors from the ranks of the Word Bearers. And their vessels protect the Machine Cathedral from orbit."
languages.original_text: "Хотя численно мы превосходим врага, дружина наша дурна. Состоит она из стальных кэрлов Омниссии да скверно обученных серфов со всего Коронуса. Противостоят же нам презренные, но от того не менее смертоносные гнилосердные юкко из боевой банды Несущих Слово. Их же ладьи прикрывают Машинный храм с орбиты".

While our foe is the detestable but nevertheless deadly putrid-hearted jukkos from the ranks of the Word Bearers. And their vessels protect the Machine Cathedral from orbit."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “或许我们有人数上面的优势，但我们的战团实在是很不像话。我们手头的士兵，只有欧姆尼塞亚手下的那些武装农奴，还有来自整个扩区的平民百姓，根本没接受过多少训练。而我们的敌人则是来自怀言者军团的战士，虽然他们是异端叛徒，但他们的战斗力非常强大。不仅如此，他们的飞船目前也在星轨上保护着那座机械大教堂。”
languages.original_text: "We may outnumber the enemy, but ours is a poor warband. All it has is steel kaerls of the Omnissiah and scantly trained serfs from across the Expanse. While our foe is the detestable but nevertheless deadly putrid-hearted traitors from the ranks of the Word Bearers. And their vessels protect the Machine Cathedral from orbit."

traits.locale_text: “或许我们有人数上面的优势，但我们的战团实在是很不像话。我们手头的士兵，只有欧姆尼塞亚手下的那些武装农奴，还有来自整个扩区的平民百姓，根本没接受过多少训练。而我们的敌人则是来自怀言者军团的战士，虽然他们是异端败类，但他们的战斗力非常强大。不仅如此，他们的飞船目前也在星轨上保护着那座机械大教堂。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Bien que nous soyons plus nombreux que l'ennemi, nos troupes font peine à voir. Nous ne pouvons compter que sur les kaerls d'acier de l'Omnimessie et des serfs à peine entraînés sortis des tréfonds des Étendues pour affronter les Word Bearers et leurs maudits traîtres aussi détestables que redoutables. Sans parler de leurs vaisseaux qui protègent la Cathédrale de la Machine depuis l'orbite. »
languages.original_text: "We may outnumber the enemy, but ours is a poor warband. All it has is steel kaerls of the Omnissiah and scantly trained serfs from across the Expanse. While our foe is the detestable but nevertheless deadly putrid-hearted traitors from the ranks of the Word Bearers. And their vessels protect the Machine Cathedral from orbit."

traits.locale_text: « Bien que nous soyons plus nombreux que l'ennemi, nos troupes font peine à voir. Nous ne pouvons compter que sur les kaerls d'acier de l'Omnimessie et des serfs à peine entraînés sortis des tréfonds des Étendues pour affronter les Word Bearers et leurs maudits jukkos aussi détestables que redoutables. Sans parler de leurs vaisseaux qui protègent la Cathédrale de la Machine depuis l'orbite. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「俺たちは敵の数を上回っているかもしれないが、我々の軍団は貧弱だ。万機神の鋼鉄のカールと、エクスパンス全域から集まった訓練もろくに受けていない素人の集まりだ。一方、敵はワードベアラーの隊列に属する、忌々しいが極めて危険で腐敗した心を持つ裏切り者どもが勢ぞろい。しかも奴らの船は軌道上から機械大聖堂を守っている」
languages.original_text: "We may outnumber the enemy, but ours is a poor warband. All it has is steel kaerls of the Omnissiah and scantly trained serfs from across the Expanse. While our foe is the detestable but nevertheless deadly putrid-hearted traitors from the ranks of the Word Bearers. And their vessels protect the Machine Cathedral from orbit."

traits.locale_text: 「俺たちは敵の数を上回っているかもしれないが、我々の軍団は貧弱だ。万機神の鋼鉄のカールと、エクスパンス全域から集まった訓練もろくに受けていない素人の集まりだ。一方、敵はワードベアラーの隊列に属する、忌々しいが極めて危険で腐敗した心を持つ裏切り者どもが勢ぞろい。しかも奴らの船は軌道上から機械大聖堂を守っている」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «Puede que superemos en número al enemigo, pero lo nuestro parece más una avanzadilla. No tenemos más que kaerls armados del Omnissiah y peleles con poca experiencia de todos los rincones de la Extensión. Mientras tanto, nuestro enemigo son los miserables traidores inmisericordes de los Portadores de la Palabra, cuyas ofensas no los hacen menos letales. Y sus naves en órbita protegen la Catedral Máquina».
languages.original_text: "We may outnumber the enemy, but ours is a poor warband. All it has is steel kaerls of the Omnissiah and scantly trained serfs from across the Expanse. While our foe is the detestable but nevertheless deadly putrid-hearted traitors from the ranks of the Word Bearers. And their vessels protect the Machine Cathedral from orbit."

traits.locale_text: «Puede que superemos en número al enemigo, pero lo nuestro parece más una avanzadilla. No tenemos más que kaerls armados del Omnissiah y peleles con poca experiencia de todos los rincones de la Extensión. Mientras tanto, nuestro enemigo son los miserables, pero no por ello menos mortales, jukkos inmisericordes de los Portadores de la Palabra. Y sus naves en órbita protegen la Catedral Máquina».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Wir mögen dem Gegner zahlenmäßig überlegen sein, doch unsere Kriegsbande ist schwach. Sie besteht nur aus stählernen Kaerls des Omnissiah und dürftig ausgebildeten Sklaven aus der gesamten Ausdehnung. Unser Feind sind die zwar verabscheuungswürdigen, aber dennoch tödlichen Verräter aus den Reihen der Word Bearers, mit Eiterbeulen statt Herzen. Und ihre Schiffe beschützen die Maschinenkathedrale vom Orbit aus."
languages.original_text: "We may outnumber the enemy, but ours is a poor warband. All it has is steel kaerls of the Omnissiah and scantly trained serfs from across the Expanse. While our foe is the detestable but nevertheless deadly putrid-hearted traitors from the ranks of the Word Bearers. And their vessels protect the Machine Cathedral from orbit."

traits.locale_text: "Wir mögen dem Gegner zahlenmäßig überlegen sein, doch unsere Kriegsbande ist schwach. Sie besteht nur aus stählernen Kaerls des Omnissiah und dürftig ausgebildeten Sklaven aus der gesamten Ausdehnung. Unser Feind ist das zwar verabscheuungswürdige, aber dennoch tödliche Ungeziefer aus den Reihen der Word Bearers, mit Eiterbeulen statt Herzen. Und ihre Schiffe beschützen die Maschinenkathedrale vom Orbit aus."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Düşmandan sayıca üstün olabiliriz ancak savaşçılarımız zayıf. Ordumuza bakın: Hermesih'in çelikten müstahdemleri ve Enginlik'in dört bir yanından devşirme, üstünkörü eğitimden geçmiş kölelerden oluşuyor. Düşmanımız ise iğrenç ancak ölümcül kara kalpleri göz ardı edilemeyecek, hain Vahyedenler. Gemilerinin, Makine Katedrali'ni yörüngeden savunduğunu da unutmayalım."
languages.original_text: "We may outnumber the enemy, but ours is a poor warband. All it has is steel kaerls of the Omnissiah and scantly trained serfs from across the Expanse. While our foe is the detestable but nevertheless deadly putrid-hearted traitors from the ranks of the Word Bearers. And their vessels protect the Machine Cathedral from orbit."
